item.title: Average long-term US mortgage rate slips to 6.27%, nearing a low for 2025
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage declined again this week, easing to just above its lowest level this year

item.title: Nestlé cuts 16,000 jobs as part of an intensifying cost-cutting campaign
item.description: Nestlé is cutting 16,000 globally as the Swiss food giant looks to trim costs and continue with its turnaround efforts

item.title: Russian barrage causes blackouts in Ukraine as Zelenskyy seeks Trump's help
item.description: Russia has launched a heavy bombardment on Ukraine's energy facilities, using hundreds of drones and dozens of missiles

item.title: Asian shares are mostly higher after Wall St ends an erratic day with gains
